column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: A woman suspected of drunk driving a ------Range Rover------ Sport HSE  hit a three-wheeler
column5: and then tried to drive away. The incident occurred along Russian Blvd in  7 Makara at 2:30 am
column7: 2019.------After the collision (which somehow saw the expensive Range Rover come out far worse than the cheap Indian trike)
column9: but cops tracked her down and took her away to the Traffic Office of Phnom Penh police.------Edit: More photos show VIP badge and what appears to be police ID in the windscreen
